actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in San Louis Obispo County, Calif., as the "Lopex Canyon Wilderness" and to establish Lopez Canyon Scenic Area.

summary.text: Designates specified lands in San Luis Obispo County, California, as the Lopez Canyon Wilderness.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in San Louis Obispo County, Calif., as the "Lopex Canyon Wilderness" and to establish Lopez Canyon Scenic Area.
